20110117023618.000|20110117023619.000|CC1|BELIEVED TO BE AT THE CENTER OF 
20110117023619.000|20110117023620.000|CC1|ITS NUCLEAR WEAPONS PROGRAM.    
20110117023620.000|20110117023622.000|CC1|BUT THE IRANIAN GUIDES MADE NO  
20110117023622.000|20110117023623.000|CC1|MENTION OF THE TECHNICAL        
20110117023623.000|20110117023625.000|CC1|PROJECTS WHICH HAVE AFFLICTED   
20110117023625.000|20110117023627.000|CC1|THE PLANT, DELAYING ITS QUEST   
20110117023627.000|20110117023629.000|CC1|FOR A BOMB BY UP TO FIVE YEARS.
